name: search_documents
description: Search documents in a project to find relevant information. Use this tool when the user asks questions about documents, wants to find specific information, or needs context from their uploaded files.

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project to search in

query.description: Natural language search query. Be specific and include key terms for better results.

document_id.description: Optional. Restrict search to a specific document by its ID. Omit to search across all documents in the project.

limit.description: Number of search results to return. Use smaller values (1-3) for precise answers, larger values (5-10) for broader context.

outputSchema.description: Search result with summarized answer and source references

answer.description: Summarized answer based on the search results

sources.description: List of source documents referenced in the answer

document_id.description: Unique identifier of the source document

segment_id.description: Unique identifier of the document segment
